title: Center of Excellence (time-boxed)
summary: A temporary structure to set standards, seed capability, and then transition ownership to platform and product teams.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Permanent CoEs become bottlenecks; modernization needs scalable ownership.
whenToUse: You need to standardize quickly across regions
whenNotToUse: You already have mature platform teams and standards

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Define the sunset plan on day one: what moves to platform team, what moves to governance.

complexity.operationalDemand: Moderateâ€”sets standards that drive ops outcomes.

realWorldExample.approach: Ran a CoE for 90 days to establish standards then transitioned ownership.
realWorldExample.outcome: Faster alignment with less long-term centralization.
